ValidationRule.description: Next Task due date should be always in future
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(Next_Task_Due_Date_Time__c) ), Next_Task_Due_Date_Time__c <= NOW(),ISCHANGED(Next_Task_Due_Date_Time__c ),OR(Subject =='Pending Information', Subject =='Service Follow up',Subject =='Resolve Service Issue')) ,true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Next Task Due Date Should be in Future
